intro: Alsodeia paniculata, commonly known as the panicled alsodea, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant produces yellow-orange flowers arranged in panicles, which are branched inflorescences. It typically grows in moist, open habitats such as grasslands and disturbed soils. Alsodeia paniculata is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive blooms and adaptability to various conditions.
